alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:13PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact central Clayton, northwestern Grant and southwestern Crawford Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 413 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Prairie Du Chien to near Garnavillo. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Guttenberg around 420 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Wauzeka, Lock And Dam 10, Wyalusing State Park, North Buena Vista, Jellystone Park Near Bagley, Turkey River, County Roads X 47 And C 7 X, Beetown, Clayton, and County Roads K And T. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
